summary:
Able to deliver results in fast paced environments by solving problems proactively. Empathy, commitment and passion help me to build strong relationships with stakeholders and peers.  I enjoy working with diverse teams and learning from multi-cultural environments.

Experienced in wide range of finance roles and sectors that coupled with strong analytics skills provide me with a broad vision and business acumen.

Looking for opportunities to unlock my entrepreneurial spirit and share knowledge with like-minded people.
